| English | Derived | Etymology | |---|---|---| | man | | | | accustom | | | | to | | | | evil | | | | more | | | | than | | | | to | | | | good | | | | then | | | | snatch | | | | me | | | | from | | | | the | | | | sweet | | | | cloister | | | | God | | | | know | | | | what | | | | my | | | | life | | | | be | | | | like | | | | afterwards | | |
